title: Eigenform (live)
abstract: Live music set by Eigenform, an electronic music and multimedia project.
description: Eigenform is an electronic music and multimedia project, started by programmer and musician Artem Popov in Berlin. In his music he combines dark beats, synths, and field recordings, mixed and played with grid controllers, often using DIY synthesizers and sequencers.

persons.biography: Software engineer, maker, musician currently living in Berlin.
